item.title: Miscellaneous Topics
item.description: Personalizing Your Shell Put all of your scripts in the ~/bin/ directory, and add ~/bin/ to your path. Beware of conflicting with system commands. One alternative is to prefix your commands with a comma. References Start all of your commands with a comma. Brandon Rhodes. rhodesmill.org . news.ycombinator.com . Aug 18, 2009.
